alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:46PM CDT until June 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHERN GILES COUNTIES... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Loretto, or 8 miles south of Lawrenceburg, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Loretto, Ardmore, St. Joseph, Elkton, Minor Hill, Goodspring, Leoma, Westpoint and Prospect. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 8. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
